content.detailedDescription: This is the third time this month i've seen this same thing.I went outside to smoke a cigg. at 6:42 central standard time. i was looking up at the stars , when i notice a plane comeing from the east. i looked to the west and there it was a red orb light ( not blinking ) . the orb was comeing from the west going east and there was another plane going the same diretion as the red orb. the plane coming from the west was ahead of the orb. what i thought was strange, was that the orb and the plane going in the same diection were close to each other when the orb past the plane. the red orb seemed to be moving faster than the plane. the planes could have been jets, i did hear jet engine. i could not tell if it was from the to planes in the sky or the none flashing red orb.
content.summary: It was red ( not blinking )  orb light

content.detailedDescription:
daughter saw what she thought was a star in sky from her bedroom window, however she shouted down to me that the star had moved!
     i went out on deck to see (star) and it was about the same bightness and size as one, however it was moving and was getting larger.  when it went below the tree line in the distance it really got my attention.  an odd thing, when i looked away from it i saw like a spot, you know like when you look at a bright object and look away, however at that point i did not think it was all that bright.
     i figured if it kept coming the same way it would pass over the local  high school, a perfect place to drive and wait, in parking lot.
     we waited for a while, nothing happened, were almost ready to leave.  at the time the ufo came into view from behind some very large pine trees and stopped just as still as can be.  it gave off now noise at all, did not waiver or move for at least 20 minutes, we stood there beside our car and watched it for all 20 minutes.  it was flat on the bottom, domed top, about 30 ft accross, had glowing red and blue lights on it.  these lights were different however, they seemed to stay the same size, but moved around the craft at will, kind of like bubbles out of a bubble pipe.  it was a very cool and clear night, the ufo gave off a red hugh, must have been more red then blue lights.  after 20 minutes of just floating there, it moved, this was strang as well, it seemed to just start off at the speed it wanted to go, did not built up speed.  it also did not follow the conture of the ground/earth, it took off very level and stayed that way.
     we (daughter and her friend and myself) tried to follow it but did not have good luck.
     it was an amazing sighting and i have never told any one outside of friends and family, my wife has always said i should tell someone like you.
     this is pretty much my story, thanks for reading it,it is all very real.                 thanks again,
                                   allen gullison
                                     5 trelane dr.
                                       springvale, me.   04083
content.summary: 30 ft dia. about 8ft high flat bottom red hugh glowing red blue lights

content.detailedDescription: My name is nancy sahlberg; i can't remember what summer month it was---but i remember the 1976 summer olympics was on t.V....And that i was a teenager then; having been born in 9/13/1962. back then i used to love to go out on summer nights and look at the stars. i was out alone in my parents backyard--it had to be sometime between 9p.M. and 10p.M.--twilight time. this was in burns, oregon. i think i had been outside for just a minute, and the street that went alongside our backyard---we had two fullgrown trees of the same type--i don,t know what tyoe they were--just average height i guees--anf they were probably about 20 feet apart.  i forgot to mention the address--788 n. buena vista blvd.   burns, oregon. i was looking that way when suddenly mid tree top level a ufo appeared out of nowhere...It was glowing red colored and cigar shaped; and i judge it to be around the size of a fullsized 70's car! it appeared at about    betwwen the middle of both trees and moved very slowly and like an up and down erratic way-and when it moved just past the other tree it just disappeared into thin air; almost like it just blinked out and became invisible!! i felt like i was frozen in more of awe than in fright at the time! and then just a few seconds latter antor ufo appeare much in the same spot as the first--it was perfectly round and about the size of a vw and glowed a yellowish-white, like a lightbulb. it moved in the same erratic pattern as the first..And just suddenly dissappearedin such a way as the first ufo!!! i felt felt awed; amazed; and really scarred at the same time--like an adrenaline rush. after that i ran inside through the back door and told my mom-mrs. garnett sahlberg. of course i felt as though she didn,t really believe me.                                      in my life since then i've probavly have sighted ufo,s at least a dozen times. one thing i wanted to add that i just remembered from when i saw those two ufo's in 1972---when i saw them it only seemed like a couple of minutes at the most---but it was still twilight when i saw the first-and when i ran back inside it was totally dark--so if i had missing time it would't surprise me one bit!!!!! i also wanted to mention that sometime in the late 1980's or very eary 90's when i was living at an apartment at 1235 e. 7th st. in reno, nev.--one night i know i was awakened out of my sleep--i remembered i couldn't move any nor speak--and i remember one of those grey type looking aliens with the large slanted totally black eyes--except this one had pure white skin and seem around my height-5"0 feet tall. it was standing on my right side and leaning over me; and i remember it saying telepathically to me-( i will father our children!); and that's all i remember! i have no proof--but i know it happened!!! and i know i would passed a lie detector test!!! i know--but not how--the whatever race of being it was that it was male--and that he would have had to have either of taken an egg-or an embryo--or not a very far along fetus from me! because if was pregnant any around that time i never new it consciously!! and i just know that he has been keeping track of me my whole life!    # if you should want to contact me please do so only by postal-mail...Unless i say so otherwise! my full name and address is: nancy arlene sahlberg     833 f. st. sparks,nevada  89431. i,m a 44 yr. old mother of 4. i,m 5"0 feet tall; overweight; fair complected w/ freckles; short-dark-brown hair and green eyes w/ glasses. my iq was tested at 128 when i was 20; and i,m of swede./scot-eng.-irish-welsh ancestory.     thank you for taking the time to read this--i hope you will believe me--if not i know it happened!
content.summary: Saw two different shape and color's of ufo's appeare and than just dissappear.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi and this is jc not the debunker that quickly jumped in.
i looked at your photos and thanks for letting me know it was a cable box.
i also didn't see anything behind the trees so no worries from me.
i was trying to be helpful and thought their mite be something there and by posting this was the only way i knew to get back to you.

i applaud your courage for taking the time to show us your photos and am a 100% believer being an abductee all my life i know they are real and get visits on a regular basis and i have learned to except what goes on.

i don't want to go into any details of my experiences for fear of retribution so we will leave it at that.
if you have seen my recent postings in the past you would have seen many real objects that i have photographed and videotaped.
i personally believe your photos are authentic.
i saw what appeared to be an entity to me and got excited and just wanted to let you know.
but now we know its a cable box and i was hoping you had caught them in that photo as i have been trying to do for so long but i really don't think they want us to photograph them.
i think they don't mind the crafts being photographed but they (intelligent life forms) on the other hand are another story.
i think in the very near future we will all see them present themselves to us.
i think your an awesome investigator and keep up the great work as we the believers need people like you around to help all of us understand what���s going on.
there will always be debunkers around as they are struggling to hide the truth but the truth seems to be appearing in our skies around the world everyday.
don���t worry we all know who takes the real photos and reports the real experiences.
may god and the angels be with you as they are with me. 
thanks jc
content.summary: Hi patty d in michigan please read this

content.detailedDescription: We live in a small town on the oregon coast called florence.Our neiborhood is a retirement gated community called greentrees.It was a clear night as i was walking my dog through our trailer park and i was on my way back home when out of the corner of my right eye i saw an object that was very bright orange, like a welders arc in brightness.This was at 8:45 because i remember right before looking at my cell phone to see the time. the object looked like two great big balls of light each about the size of the moon. i noticed some kind of structure{very dimley lit}between the balls of light.I followed it as it moved slowly and silently along to my right,and i was able to keep up with it until it got to my house. i was so suprised and stunned at what i was seeing that i forgot to call my wife on the phone and tell her to come out the front  door and see it! it went down our road until it got over the woods and then circled back twards me! it was only about three houses down when it then went up our back hill and off to the west. as i was watching it go west twards the ocean, it like blinked off and was gone. after this event i have become obsesed with finding out what this could have been. i also called our police about it but that went no where. our coastguard was doing work down south in a town called reedsport and if it had been there helicopter i certainly would know by its loud rotors. it moved somewhat irregularly as it hovered so i know it wasn't a plane,also made no sound like a plane, no sound at all
content.summary: It looked like two very bright orange balls stuck together side by side and pulsating

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and i heard a boom.
content.summary: Shining

content.detailedDescription:
hi,  i am 51 years old and have served in my younger days as a sergeant in the british army and also worked for local newspapers (as a courier) for 20 years. my wife is the deputy editor of a local newspaper series here in n ireland that covers the area of this event.She has worked on these papers for 26 years.To the best of both our knowledge no one has ever reported what i am going to relate to you below, either before or since. very few people have ever been told this story as those who have (in a weaker moment!)  laugh! therefore it is one of these things that you tend to keep to yourself. i watched a documentry last night on the history channel about your organisation and this has inspired me to seek an answer elsewhere (if possible) after 34 years. my many years of trying have come to nought. in my army days i asked many questions of pilots (both helicopter and aeroplane) who flew this short stretch of water on a regular basis and none had seen anything out of the ordinary.There is also a regular ferry run to scotland (on a daily basis) from larne and those i have spoken to who worked on the boats again reported nothing.
 i have attached a picture of the area that i found on the internet and although taken from 5 miles more northerly on the coastline will give you an idea of the area. in 1972 i did not have any camera. in the backgound you can see the scottish coastline (22 miles away) the lighthouse is arrowed in red and the approx area of exit of the objects is in black and the path followed in green.

  'at approximately 10.45pm on the evening of november 3rd 1972 (i remember it well as it was my 17th birthday) i was with a girl in a covered seafront shelter at larne (co antrim, n ireland) and we were enjoying each others company! the shelter was on a hill top (100 feet above sea level) that looked out over the irish sea (north channel) towards scotland that lay about 25 miles away to the east. a lighthouse (called 'the maidens', manned at that time and 75 feet tall) is situated about 7 miles out to sea from this point and warns ships of rocks that crop up out of the sea here. i had lived beside the sea all my life (up to this point) and was familiar with the lighthouse and the pattern of it's beam. i had been out to it on field trips while at school to study the rocks it sits on.
  on this night (we had been to this place many times before) we had been friendly for a while when the girl drew my attention to a blinding green light out to sea. i turned out to look towards the sea and some distance beyond the lighthouse ( which was continuing it's usual pattern of horizontal flashes) we watched for some 15 minutes as a blinding (much much brighter than the lighthouse beam) series of green fluorescent cylinders exited the sea and shot straight and vertically heavenwards.They came every 30 seconds or so and we knew when they were coming as the sea itself around the exit point would glow bright green for a few seconds before we saw the cylinder exit the sea and fly at great speeds upwards and disappear into 'space'?  even at seven or eight miles away this glow in the sea lit up the whole area around it. after 15 minutes it just stopped! no more came, we watched for another hour.
 these  cylinders were huge as i was able to determine (using the lighthose as a guide) that they were at the very least the height of the lighthouse (80 feet) and certainly as thick as it. they left no trial behind. pattern was that the sea glowed green, cylindar emerged and shot upwards so quick that  you almost cricked your neck with the upward movement of the head following it. they came at regular 30 second intervals,almost perfect timing.They all followed exactly the same path upwards,something about the timing made me feel very uncomfortable. nothing natural would be able to do this.I was absolutely awestruck.'
  the nearest that i have come to an explanation was several years ago when information came to light that an area beyond this (the beaufort dyke, a deep underwater trench in the north channel) had been used to dump munitions in since ww1 times. these munitions included phosphorus items. i wondered if some of these munitions could have caused such an event. i have since discounted this as it does not explain several things. why has it never been reported again, does not explain the shapes (in each case they were identical),the timings of the exits, the identical path they followed up and the enormous speed of the things. the intensity of the green light was again the same with each one that emerged. they were perfectly controlled and not a random 'explosion' of anything.
  it was nothing to do with the lighthouse beam (which has always been white and horizontal) as we had a clear sight of it all the time, as the exit point was on an almost straight line between our eyeline and the beyond the lighthouse.
  submarines have always been about in the north channel as they make their way to fastlane (scotland) but what the h*** would a sub be doing launching such enormous cylinders (even if they could back then) and these things were faster than any rocket, their speed was breathtaking. 
  i went out with this same girl for eight years after this event before we parted company. we had shared many many things to-gether. i met her a few years back after not seeing her for 20 years or so and the first thing she said to me was ' remember that strange night". it had stuck in her mind all these years to the extent that it was the first thing that sprang to her mind after such a long absence.She also told me that it had 'freaked' her out and that she had never told anyone and never will speak of it again.She told me that even now she wakes up and gets very scared when she thinks of it. at the time she was too awestruck to be afraid.
  i never saw anything like this again and even to-day after huge amounts of 'logical' thought time i am still at a loss.Even with all the advances in military technology which i try to keep up with, i would still say "i have never seen anything like this"! i am glad that i have taken the time to write this down as it has vexed me many times over the years, i like explanations and this thing i cannot get to grips with even now.
  only one other event troubles me. a few years back i woke from sleep (was at home, just a normal night) to find that the skin on the palms of my hands and the soles of my feet were bright red and burning. had trouble walking on my feet and had to take a few days off work. this went away after a few days and a lot of cooling with water. on waking that morning my wife told me that i had  something like a small black 'thorn' stuck in my right temple. it was so small that she ended up getting tweezers to get it out with. it was about one eighth of an inch long and black.I have no explanation how it got there. we thought it was some sort of wood thorn that had managed to get on the pillow and i had 'rolled' on to it in the night. i decided to cut it with a small penknife and to my great surprize it turned out to be metallic like a needle point. i then tried to cut it with a small pair of scissors but again was unable to. it started to show silver under the black as the implements had 'rubbed' the black coating off. it was the broken tip of a black needle. sharp and pointed at one end and rough and jagged at the thicker end.
 i still have it somewhere in a small sealed plastic bag. not sure where, but am pretty sure that it is here somewhere, unless the children have made off with the bag not knowing what was in it. so unless my wife was trying to inject me in the temple during the night without my knowing (she assures me she wasn't!!) then i have absolutely no idea how this point came to be there .I was nowhere where such a thing would have been and if it had happened i think that i would have felt the pain, after all this fragment was lodged an eighth of an inch in the side of my head.I have no recollection of anything unusual that night, went to bed, slept and got up next morning. no explanation.
    i have never spoken to my wife in great detail about the cylinders and have always insisted that i was alone, as the 'girl' with me at the time was my first wife and my present wife of twenty years and her have never been anything closer than enemies!! would appreciate not mentioning that i was other than alone if you decide to send any emails on this subject. i have never written these stories down before and never contacted anyone about them.
   thank you for listening and if you can offer any ideas on these events i would be more than grateful as they have perplexed me for a very long time. i know it was a long time ago and it may be of little interest to you but i felt i needed to pass it on as i have been convinced since that night that, ' there are more things in heaven and earth. horatio, than are dreamt of in your philosophy' .     thanks,  george martin.
content.summary: Sea exiting objects (cylinders) observed over a 15 minute period.

content.detailedDescription:
Objects seen on the ground could be leaned against the trees. possible fake. movement of camera could explain blurs. word 97 text with photos enlarged.

first photo shows two things on the ground behind some trees. enhanced 200% shows a glowing right hand (behind right tree). in negative the objects are a different color than the corn indicating that they are closer to the camera. 

the blur photo shows more of the thing behind the left tree. sharpness was increased three times.
content.summary: Analysis of clinton county photos

content.detailedDescription:
I was @ work friday afternoon. i work @ a daycare and had the kids on an open field next to the church where the daycare is located. i was walking in a northerly direction across the field with some kids and looked up in to the sky. it was a bright, clear day and there were very few clouds,if any. i saw a bright shiny silver object off to the north and i immediately thought it was a plane. there is an airport in roswell and we see planes over this field all the time.Then i realized the object wasn't moving. i watched it for a few minutes more. it just hung there, reflecting the sun. i also thought it might be a light on an antennae, but could see nothing under it. it looked like it might have been spinning. a co-worker called me and i looked over @ her and when i turned back( no more then 4 seconds) the object had disappeared from view. i searched the sky in every direction to find it but it was just gone!
i didn't feel scared or freaked out. just mildly surprised that i actually saw something i could not explain, a ufo. i thought to myself " oh. so that's what they look like. go figure."
the object loked like 2 shallow bowls on top of each other.With my arms straight out in front of me it looked to be an inch in length. it had to have been huge for me to see it. it was far off in the distance but clearly visible. it was silver and shiny, reflecting the sunlight. i guess its brightness is what caught my eye in the first place. i always look up when outside.I live in roswell! i appeared to hang motionless in the sky. as  said i first thought it was a plane, so i kept waiting for it to change direction or something. it could have been rotating in place because the light did seem to have movement, like a shimmer. i saw no lights from my vantage point. i heard no engine noise. when i turned to my coworker and turned back to the object it was no longer there. it had simply disappeared. i searched the sky to try to find it, but couldn't. the whole event took no more then 5 minutes.
content.summary: I saw a silver disc hanging in the sky. i watched it for 5 minutes. it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
on monday morning, november 13, 2006, i had a few extra minutes, before a dentist appointment, and i noticed the sky was a beautiful light purple, lavender color, so i decided to take some pictures. i took many pictures, and in a series of shots, i captured a huge object. 
   i took this picture with a sony dsc-h1 super steady shot/5.1 megapixels/12x optical zoom/digital camera.
   i have included just 3 pictures, from the series, that were taken in sequence....Before, during, after. you will notice the "blurring effect" i get whenever "something is around", in the "before" picture. 

thank-you.
patty d.
mufon international field investigator &
michigan mufon field investigator (clinton county)
content.summary: Huge object  above woods across from my driveway..........

content.detailedDescription: A cousin of mine and i were riding on cypress creek dirt road coming back from lifting weights at my uncles barn.  we took the back way from the barn to my cousin's house so that we could possibly spot a few deer along the way.  we were approximately 2 miles from my cousin's home when he slammed on brakes and pointed at the sky to my right hand side.  i followed his finger until i too noticed the light.  it was a very bright yellowish color and it was just hanging in the sky in one place like a second moon (that's how large the light was).  we both thought that maybe it was the moon behind cloud cover until we looked around and saw the moon, and there was hardly any clouds in the sky.  it must've stayed in one place for only 30 seconds before it started moving horizontally across the sky from left to right.  the rate of speed was beyond anything i could possibly imagine, in less than 1 second it shot across, roughly, a quarter of the horizon i could see and stopped again.  the second time the "object" stopped the light reduced in size and started blinking in bursts about 3 times a second.  it stayed in that place for maybe another 30 seconds and then the blinking light stopped, and shifted to a deep red color (not blinking).  i was unable to see an outline of the object at this point because of the distance it was from us.  after it stayed still for 30 seconds or so, it immediately changed direction coming straight toward our vehicle at an extremely fast speed.  we were both unsure of what to do, and honestly we both were having a hard time believing what we were seeing at that point and time.  it got close enough that i could see the shape of the object.  it was a perfect equilateral triangle shape and now i could notice that the lights weren't changing colors, but on two points of the triangle the lights were yellow and blinking and the forward facing point the light was a deep red.  so i guess when it was on the horizon it was simply rotating, or changing it's direction and that's why we were noticing a change of color on the lights.  it took only about 15 seconds to get directly above our location from it's distant point on the horizon.  by this time i could clearly see it was some kind of unknown craft and it was huge.  it was entirely silent, no smell of fuel burning, no wind or anything.  we were so dumbfounded i can only give a rough size estimate, i'd say it was the size of half a football field.  my cousin was in a bad position being inside the truck to get a good look at it once it was so close to us.  i had my head out of the window of the truck and was getting a good view of it.  it must've stayed over our heads and slowly lowering towards the ground for a couple minutes.  at this time i look over at my cousin and notice that he's not even trying to look at the craft, he had his eyes straight ahead on the road and was scared enough to be shaking.  it happened so fast it all gets blurry from this point.  i wasn't scared up until the point it got directly overhead from us and at this point i remember having an immediate and overwhelming fear like i was in serious danger.  i remember while looking at the craft, yelling to my cousin to take off because it's going to fall on us.  he kind of came out of a daze (i'm not sure if he was even consious because he kind of jumped like coming out of a deep sleep) and took off towards his house.  i looked back at the object as we were taking off and could no longer see it.  in what could only be maybe a few seconds the craft was gone.  no trace of it anywhere in the sky.  as we were heading towards the house we both were still shaking and were trying to explain to each other exactly what we saw.  i had the best view of it and had to tell my cousin about it's shape and size.  at this point i asked him why he was staring ahead at the road and not looking at the craft, and his only answer was he didn't know why.  it seemed like time froze for him he said for a few minutes.  when i yelled to him he came out of it and that's when he remembers taking off.  it took maybe 2 hours for the full effect of the fear to wear off and i still didn't sleep well last night.  i was constantly getting up and peeking out my window, i wouldn't go outside because i was honestly scared of what i might see.  i remember looking at the clock just before the sighting so the time is very exact.  the time of the encounter was only about 5 minutes and we were less than 2 miles from his house, but it took us a lot longer than it should have.  we both have missing time gaps of maybe 20 minutes.  my cousins recollection of the event was very clear up until the point that it flew directly overhead of us.  my recollection of the entire event is crystal clear.  i really got scared when we got home and noticed a small time gap, i'm not sure if the encounter lasted a lot longer than i thought, or if i made a mistake judging the time (which is unlikely).  but it's all very strange to me.  also, after we arrived at the house we noticed two helicopters heading toward the spot where we saw the object.  i hope someone else spotted it and can give another account.  also, if anyones witnessed this before i'd like to hear information on the subject.  i'm too scared of what people will think to really ask around town, so any information would help put my mind at ease.  if you would like to contact me by phone or email to explain the sighting, please do so.  i'd be happy to answer any questions.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright stationary object in the sky in the distance.  started moving at rapid speed horizontally from me at amazingly rapid speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was washing clothes sunday night. our washer and dryer are in the utility room outside of our house. it was between 7:30 and 8:00 p.M.. i had either read or saw on t.V. recently that our sun actually gives off white light and not yellow or orange like our eyes see during the day. because of the spectrum effect our atmosphere has. so i was looking at the stars saying to myself, the stars do all appear to give off white light, no sooner had that thought crossed my mind, when i see 2 lights move across my field of view very quickly. i am going to do my best to relate this incident exactly as it happened. my viewing of these objects lasted between 7 and 10 seconds. if i would have been in a treeless area, i could have seen them a lot longer. and i'll tell you why. my very first thought on seeing these ufos was that they were shooting stars, nope-- i've never seen 2 shooting stars travelling together. they were white lights, kind of dim with fuzzy light blue around the white(you could barely see the the blue) at first they were moving parallel with one another. the second one maybe 5 to ten miles behind the other one, while i was watching, the second one left the path it was on and flew close to the other one, then went back to it's original trajectory. i would estimate they were 5 to 10 miles above the earth, moving north to south parallel with the earth. it was really weird, but i knew i was witnessing something that was not from this earth. judging by the time i saw them, i would say they were travelling at between 600 and 800 mph. oh yea, they made no sound. it was a very clear night,not much wind at all. all you could really see were the lights. i couldn't make out any shape. they stayed the same brightness the entire time i saw them, the trees in my neighbors yard blocked my view, when they flew behind them. one other thing about them was how smooth they moved, i am almost 40 and i have never seen anything move like these 2 lights. if they were extraterrestrial craft, i wonder what they were doing? where were they going? we have air force bases in mississippi and florida relatively close to us. i can saythat a weird sensation went over me, but i don't know if it was from finally really seeing a ufo or something else. it was amazing to see and i probably will never be the same again.
content.summary: 2 ufos flew over mobile, alabama

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were going for a drive in the country to watch the stars from a field near her parents house.  it is pretty far out in the country so the sky is not lit by lights from the ground, making it easier to see the stars.  we had been out in the field for maybe a half hour when i spotted a flashing light in the sky, towards the northwest.  being a pilot myself i was aware that the flashes were not those of an aircraft, they were not flashing at a set speed.  the light was amber colored and alternated between a slow flash and a rapid flash.  we watched these flashes for about 15 minutes, as it seemed to circle above and towards the north.  then just as quickly as they had appeared, they were gone, moving rapidly south.

my friend was sure this was a plane, but i explained to her that aircraft have a different set of strobe lighting, plus the lights couldnt have been more than 3000 feet up, yet there was no noise.
content.summary: Wierd light

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on state route 23 form a business meeting in bowling green, oh. clear day. no clouds. had just passed the small town of waldo, oh. my cb radio was on and i was listening to "trucker chatter" on channel 19. about the same time as i heard a truck driver, (just ahead of me, in the right lane), ask, "what the heck is that!" i saw what i thought was one of the goodyear blimps. it looked to about 5 to 8 miles ahead at approx. 5000 feet. it was not moving. as i continued looking at it i noticed that there were no tail fins on it! that's strang for a blimp, i thought! "yeah, it's gotta be a blimp" one trucker said. then, it was gone! i never saw any movement! it just disappeared! then one of the truckers said that maybe it's one of those advertising planes towing an add and it just turned away from us. however we keep watching the sky in that direction and never saw anything agian! i kept in contact with 2 truckers form that time until we were all of the way through the city of delaware, (15 to 20 minutes) in route to columbus, oh. i do not know the truck drivers. one of the trucks was a yellow freight lines. the other was an independant. we all had a clear view of the southern sky for that intire period of time. we also noticed other drivers looking at the same area as we continued south!
content.summary: Silver/gray blimp without tail fins. (large)

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to let my dog out. lokked up, and then there was a flash and the huge object took off so quickly it left two huge trails of blue luminnescent light. completely unreal and out-of -this world looking!
content.summary: Flash that then took off .....Trailed by two huge light blue luminescent trails that remained momentarily it took off so fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I want to start off by adding to my report from earlier today.
i reported that i saw many jets yesterday with chemtrails and the chemtrails got larger and wider as time went on to almost form clouds.
today it happened in our area and i took some pictures.
i'm attaching three pictures.

the first is some of the chemtrails over delray.
the second is the national hurricane center radar loop of this area.
the third is a formation of unknowns i saw as small above and they were slowly moving to the north at 8:28pm.

i tried to zoom in as close as i could and this is what i got.
i was just outside 10:00pm est to look some more and it is hazy now i think from the chemtrails.
i'm not an expert on chemtrails and by no means this may not be the case so i'll let the readers come to their own conclusions.
all i can do is report what i see and give my opinions.
thanks for reading
jc
content.summary: Photo of unknowns in delray beach, forida

content.detailedDescription:
Don broeder (chopper pilot) and myself (fixed wing pilot)were driving from the airport to ro rendezvous with scarce and hard to get dates. we both reluctantly decided to check this out. we booted back to the airport,removed the engine tent and heaters of the beaver, taxing i advised ken carpender on air radio that we were doing a local flight to check this out.
to the north west it is flat to the mountain range 80mi away, no winter roads, no oil rigs, nothing that could be producing this phenomenom.
we flew out about five miles without seeing a thing, we tryed different altitudes and still nothing.
landing, ken advised that we should come over and take a look as  he had climbed the stairs to the roof and discovered our object.On the roof the three of us watched this thing perform. rising from the horizon as a single object then decending below the horizon leaving as many as five distinct glow's. it was decided that i would get back and uncover the beaver leaving don on the roof to comunicate down to ken comunicating with me. taking off again still nothing. don says your heading right for it. the airport is on a bit of a plato and was able to decend lower than don on the roof, still nothing. ken joind don on the roof watching this thing perform, they both can see this and i can't. 
we finally got to town to late to take care of business. my date (a hardend cafe operator) (who i ended up married to) was sympathetic for been stood up as she had recently had an encounter that we put down as swamp gas. her story with picture made the local paper. our important encounter didn't, sometimes life is just not fair.
in comperison a star the size of small tapioca and shiny this object been the size of large tapioca, duller and more yellow.
both don and i experienced a strange loss of interest to this experience.
i have felt  that this contributed to a number of phenomenal things encountered over the years.
content.summary: An arcing object decended settling on the horizon. this object would decend below the horizon leaving a glow then apear. decending again to produce two distinct glow's then up again as a single object then down with three glow's. it was decided to check t

content.detailedDescription:
I was sky watching as ive had several sightings over yrs. my neighbour irene and i sat in my garden i heard high pitch noise got up looked north after seeing strange cloud. we were on manchester flight path junc 28 m1
i then saw bright starlike object something shot out of it moved under control right then to the left slowly didnt dull when jet came over. then i tried to get cam on it as couldnt get on stand quick enough. after 10 mins zigzagging blue flashes. i though maybe meteor. but y move left to right on 3 occassions.

then saw another onject shoot out 1 went right one left no noise.We watched display for 20mins at this point i didnt dare move couldnt keep up with it.Then irene pushed me to side of our extension on house i dropped cam by side as a small candle sized bulb seem to elongate flash blue and stopped at eye level any arked back to where it had come really weird.

it was magnesium white and blinding i turned sidewards irene was blinded by it. we both had rahes and also didnt realise we were watching for 40 mins lost about 10.We both had nightmares rashes she suffered a brain haemorragh shortly after an anarism we both had headaches i thought menopause prior to this my eye test good no glasses i had to where glasses and development a stigma in my right eye after this she died last year of a stroke.

i cant help but think this was the cause of irnes death.I visited a hypnotist for weight loss and relazation but on the third he said you wont be able to open your eyes i had a memory flash irene and i something else happened that night. i never went back and we moved a couple of years on. there have beeen many sightings one a triangle 1995 26th jan from my garden 6.35pm it later flashed a bilsthorpe couple who said it buzzed them lit up like an xmas tree.Mark haywood a avard ufo watcher came off m1 junc 28 to see it he never knew i lived there at south normanton derbys near roman rd..I would likesomeone to investigate that area as we have had several sightings...
content.summary: Saw strange cloud looked north daw bright starlike object something xame out of it when it moved lrft to right and back contolled

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home to duluth from roswell, ga that night on holcomb bridge rd. as i crossed the bridge across the chatahoochee river, i looked out the left window of my car to see a bright yellow-white light hovering at roughly bridge-level over the river, it was well under the treeline. i estimated the object to be somewhere in the range of 100 feet down the river from me, and initially deduced that it must have been a light on a house along the river or something similar. but something just didn't seem right about that explaination. i have driven that stretch of road hundreds of times at all hours of the day and have never seen a light like that before, or since. traffic was a little heavy at the time of the sighting, so i could not manage to turn around to further observe the object and lost sight of it after i crossed the bridge.
content.summary: Light seen floating over chatahoochee river

you can hear the voice from many little animals and a group wild living dogs who run in our direction.
wir h���rten die lauten ger���usche von grillen, heuschrecken und einer gruppe von wilden hunden die sich uns n���herten.
we think our trip to the moon let ring up the bells by the big brother in a other dimension who is watching the earth. 
wir glauben unser ausflug zum mond hat die alarmglocken bei unserem gro���en bruder der die erde st���ndig beobachtet in einer anderen dimension ausgel���st.

content.summary: What we can see is different to all other ufo events what we know

content.detailedDescription:
Last night was an active night for ufo spotting.
my day starts in ft lauderdale at my friends scott���s house and i went down to help him put in his last new window.
we saw at at least 8 chemtrail jets and i told him there must be objects in the sky today but he insists that they were spraying something in the air and i think he may be right.
they were covering the sky over ft lauderdale and all were flying south and i was still seeing them at 1:30pm when i was driving back to delray beach.
i did take a look at the radar last night after all my sightings and it did look like the radar was filled with reflective partials.
maybe the military is dispersing reflective partials so the ufos can operate in this area without detection.
for all we know they may be involved with the ets.

at this point who knows but i find it mysterious and this is why.
i have been watching the skies here for the last week and it has been quiet until i saw those jets spraying whatever.

at 8:15pm i was observing the sky over this area and all of a sudden i saw a long thin black line in the sky. it was pointed east to west and if i looked at it straight on it disappeared but if i just looked away a tiny bit above or below it i could see it and the length was as far as my eyes could see it.
it may have also been a dark beam of light or whatever.

then at 8:23pm i saw a brief streak of a very low tree top craft and it was brown and it looked like i thought was a triangle or something in that shape.
it moved very quickly and for a second and my trained eye caught it and like i said it was treetop level and almost just barely visible and it had no lights and no sound and zoomed from east to west.
in another second i saw very high strobe blink once then a small streak (meaning it only streaked just a small distance i guess to gain speed and also moving to the west.

within three minutes here comes a military jet from the east and flew right over the exact area i saw the objects then another military jet came in from the northwest and crossed the sky in the same area. so that told me the objects knew the jets were coming and they moved very fast out of the area.
remember in the past i reported the strobe objects flash once when a military jet is coming well that���s the warning and i know this for sure now.
they don't flash warnings for commercial aircraft only when the highflying military jets are approaching.

at 8:53pm i saw another strobe flash and streak heading to my west and then again at 9:10pm.
this is the strangest thing i saw at 9:30pm  another high flying military jet came into view from the east heading west but when it got a little past me it just disappeared completely.
when i tell you completely it could have only been one of three scenarios.

first: the pilots turned off all the blinking white and red lights and continued cruising. which is very unlikely.

second: they flew into a hole in the sky, and by the way this is that exact area of the sky i had reported about before with a lot of weird things happening and most of my ufo objects were filmed and photographed there. so maybe they went into a hole or maybe something else.
i stood there watching for another hour or so and never saw that jet again.
i always follow the jets with my eyes in case i see something following them or to see if any objects respond nearby.
the sky was clear and i always can see the jet lights the full path across the sky until they are far off in the distance.
to be honest with you i was quite alarmed that it had just disappeared and i intensely scanned the sky for it but saw nothing.
i finally went to bed around midnight.

third: it may not have been a jet but maybe a ufo instead that just vanished when it got to that area of the sky.  

i also saw a few objects that were black moving around but i was not sure so i didn't look at the time or log those objects.
so that���s what i observed here in delray beach, florida last night.
also i see the government gb debunkers are posting on here. 
 
thanks for reading and hope to get more photos and videos soon. 
please keep the sightings, pictures and videos coming we all enjoy reading them. 
jc
content.summary: Corrections on my last sighting report

jc
content.summary: Unknowns seen in delray beach, florida last night

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i had just finished moving a table from my raised deck to underneath the deck before our first snow arrives.  after moving the table we went up the stairs to the deck again.  it was a very clear night, the stars were bright, and i was just enjoying the view.  as i was looking up and around, i saw a section of sky that appeared to be moving out of sync with the stars.  at first i thought it was a dark kite, but it was going too straight and smooth in its direction.  i said "what's that?"  out loud as i pointed at it, and my friend looked up and saw it too.  it was traveling south almost parallel to hwy 94, i'm just on the north side of 94, west of 25.  my friend and i watched till it was out of range, about 15 seconds or so.  we didn't really have enough time to speculate out loud to each other much, we were just watching.  afterward, we described to each other what we saw.  we both agreed it was somewhat boomerang shaped, traveling in a straight line, maybe a hundred feet in the air or so, no sharp outline, just a set of white points similar to stars fading in and out, but moving together rather slowly, too slow for a plane.  my friend described the shape shifting in and out of view, as if it were trying to cloak itself.  it occurred to also that that was why it didn't seem to have edges, it seemed to blend into the sky and stars, as if the light was bending around it.  neither of us could say what it was for sure.  it was the first time either of us had seen anything like it.  i'm 33 and he is 28.  i wear glasses for driving, which i had on that night, he doesn't wear glasses.  the only mutual feeling we had was wonder and disbelief.  i wished we had longer to observe it.
content.summary: Sighting of lights boomerang shaped traveling south, right near hwy 94.

content.detailedDescription: My little brother left to try out the hyundai to see if it was running o.K. my father and i were standing outside watching for him to come back up the hill and all of the sudden my dad goes look what is that in a really startled manner. i seen it too and it was not a meteorite it was a large streaking sparking fireball going twoards the manitowoc area by lake michigan. and it looked as if it may have crashed somewhere? my father also reported to me seeing a clear tube above the house one morning in daytime he went to get the binoculars and it was gone when he went back out to look at it. this is in a rural area so it is really easy to spot these things late at night.Call the house and talk to my dad his name is glen harter and he can talk you're ear off about these wretched things.
content.summary: Well we were just getting ready to go on vacation and we were outside working on my hyundai

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on route 295.  we just went under the overpass at the "al joe,s circle". this is the name of the section of 295 that everyone knew because of the club al joe,s being right there at the dangerous turn on route 295. many deaths at this section of route 295. we came out from under the overpass and i looked up into the sky.  i was  the passenger in the car. i saw a very large circular object in the sky and it was just above the thin overcast.  i estimate the ceiling at around 300 ft.  the circular object glowed a greenish blue. it then disappeared in the overcast. the event only lasted around two seconds but it something i will always remember like it was yesterday.  this area of south jersey is only aprox 10 miles from phila international airport. there are usually many aircraft in the sky at all times but this was not a plane or helicopter.  i am a private pilot so i am very familiar with plane lights and weather ceilings.  we drove around the deptford area for a few hours after the sighting but saw nothing unusual. we were both very excited and expected to see something but didn't.   the next day in the papers there was an article in the gloucester county times about the strange lights in the sky and many witnesses. the date and year are aproximates. i am trying to research newspaper articles to get an exact date of the event but thats easier said than done. the driver of the vehicle is a good friend but he did not see anything. i am sure we were in the terminal control area for phila international airport.
content.summary: I was a passenger in the car when i looked up and saw a large circular object just above the thin overcast. it glower a greenish blue.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking across the courtyard of town and county apartments in new paltz, on my way to change my laundry over, when i saw flying slowly in the clear blue sky, a black triangle. it was between five and six and still light outside. first i thought, "is that a very large triangular bird?" the craft was moving very slowly and was only 1/4 of a mile in the sky. my mind could not force its shape into that of a bird however and so my second thought was,"why are they flying stealth aircraft at this time of day?" and then i became a little worried that perhaps military movements were being made. the craft look very much like a b-2 spirit. i lost sight of the craft as it disappeared behind the tree line. it's flight path was straight the whoie time. my third thought was "heh. oh well, i've got laundry to do." the whole incident didn't really disturb me and i didn't really think of it for whole week. but i am curious to know if anyone else saw this craft.
content.summary: Daytime. black triangle, flying slowly. was less than 1/4 mile high in the sky. looked like a b-2 spirit.

content.detailedDescription: See complete report appended below.  white_salmon_report.Rtf.
content.summary: Six goats killed mysteriously -- three mutilated.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1979, i was a deputy sheriff for red river county, texas sheriff's office.  i was on patrol approximately one and a half miles east of detroit, texas on u.S. hwy. 82.  i pulled my patrol car onto the shoulder to meet another deputy, john penny.  we were parked on the shoulder and both of us observed a large disc-shaped object hovering about twenty feet above the ground on the south side of the highway, over a field.  the object was initially moving toward us and looked like two dinner plates, one inverted on top of another.  around the midline of the disc was a bright band of very white light.  when the disc stopped moving foward, it was approximately 50 yards from our position.  when the forward motion stopped, the band of light around the center ceased and only a smaller bright light, like a landing light on a plane, was visible in the middle.  there was absolutely no sound.  the disc was very large, probably 100 feet in circumference and approximately 10-12 feet in height at the highest point.  no windows or portals were observed.  the object appeared metallic, but was not not shinny like tin foil or polished aluminum.  after watching the disc for several minutes, deputy penny decided he would attempt to get closer to the disc.  he got in his patrol care and drove across the highway and south on a county road which ran parallel to and very near the disc.  at about the time deputy penny's vehicle was adjacent to the disc, the bright light around the midline returned and the disc moved slightly upward and accelerated to the west at a phenomenal speed.  the sun was setting in the west, so i was able to observe the disc for some time.  it seemed to achieve a very high altitude.  there was a trail from it, though not like a vapor trail.  it appeared more like the tail of a comet.  the disc moved in an arc over the horizon and out of sight.  i never heard any noise at all.  i have only told one person previously; an uncle who has a ph.D. in physics and engineering.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Along with another deputy sheriff, sighted ufo hovering over filed near highway 82
